Uses of Class
company.Manager

  • Packages that use Manager 
    Package Description
    company  

    • Uses of Manager in company

      Methods in company that return Manager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Manager Company.assignNewHeadManager(java.lang.String _firstname, java.lang.String _lastname, Department _department)
      Creates and assigns a new manager as head of a department of the company and returns him.
      Manager Company.assignNewManager(java.lang.String _firstname, java.lang.String _lastname, Department _department)
      Creates and assigns a new manager a department of the company and returns him.
      Manager Department.getHeadManager()
      Returns the head manager of the department.
      Manager Company.getManagerByID(int _managerID)
      Returns the manager of the company who has the given ID if he exists, null otherwise.
      Manager Company.promoteEmployee(Employee _employee)
      Promotes the given employee to the role of manager and returns the result.
      Methods in company that return types with arguments of type Manager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Manager> Department.getManagers()
      Returns the managers of the department.
      java.util.ArrayList<Manager> Company.getManagers()
      Returns all the managers of the company.
      Methods in company with parameters of type Manager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Department.assignHeadManager(Manager _manager)
      Assigns the given manager as head manager of the department.
      void Company.assignHeadManager(Manager _manager, Department _department)
      Assigns an existing manager as head of a department of the company.
      void Department.assignManager(Manager _manager)
      Assigns the given manager the department.
      void Company.assignManager(Manager _manager, Department _department)
      Assigns an already existing manager a department of the company.
      boolean Department.containsManager(Manager _manager)
      Returns true if the department contains the manager, false otherwise.
      boolean Company.containsManager(Manager _manager)
      Returns true if the company contains the given manager, false otherwise.
      Employee Company.demoteManager(Manager _manager)
      Demotes the given manager to the role of employee.
      void Department.dismissManager(Manager _manager)
      Dismisses the manager from the department.
      void Company.dismissManager(Manager _manager)
      Dismisses a manager from the company
      boolean Department.isManagedBy(Manager _manager)
      Returns true if the given manager is the head manager of the department, otherwise false.
      Constructors in company with parameters of type Manager 
      Constructor and Description
      Employee(Manager _manager)
      Creates an employee from a given manager.
